tools.name: Create Hyperbrowser Profile
tools.description: Tool to create a new profile. Use when you need to initialize a Hyperbrowser profile before analysis.

name.description: Optional profile name for easy identification
name.title: Name

inputParameters.title: CreateProfileRequest
inputParameters.description: Request model for creating a new Hyperbrowser profile.

id.description: Unique identifier of the created profile
id.title: Id

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Create Scrape Job
tools.description: Tool to initiate a new scrape job. Use when you need to extract structured content from a target URL with custom session and scrape settings.

excludeTags.description: CSS selectors or tags to exclude
excludeTags.title: Exclude Tags

includeTags.description: CSS selectors or tags to include
includeTags.title: Include Tags

onlyMainContent.description: Return only the main content of the page
onlyMainContent.title: Only Main Content

waitFor.description: Delay in ms after page load before scraping
waitFor.title: Wait For

enableVideoWebRecording.description: Record video when web recording is enabled
enableVideoWebRecording.title: Enable Video Web Recording

extensionIds.description: IDs of browser extensions to load
extensionIds.title: Extension Ids

persistChanges.description: Whether to persist changes to the profile
persistChanges.title: Persist Changes

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Create Session
tools.description: Tool to create a new browser session with custom stealth, proxy, and privacy settings. Use when initializing an automated browsing session with specific configuration.

extensionIds.description: List of extension IDs (UUIDs) to attach
extensionIds.title: Extension Ids

imageSelector.description: CSS selector of the CAPTCHA image element
imageSelector.title: Image Selector

inputSelector.description: CSS selector of the CAPTCHA input field
inputSelector.title: Input Selector

proxyCity.description: Desired proxy city; mutually exclusive with proxyState
proxyCity.title: Proxy City

proxyCountry.description: Two-letter proxy country code (e.g., US, GB)
proxyCountry.title: Proxy Country

proxyState.description: Two-letter US state code; mutually exclusive with proxyCity
proxyState.title: Proxy State

screen.description: Screen configuration: width and height in pixels.
screen.title: ScreenConfig

height.description: Screen height in pixels, must be >=1
height.title: Height

width.description: Screen width in pixels, must be >=1
width.title: Width

urlBlocklist.description: List of URL patterns to block
urlBlocklist.title: Url Blocklist

useProxy.description: Route session via a proxy server
useProxy.title: Use Proxy

useStealth.description: Enable stealth mode to reduce detection
useStealth.title: Use Stealth

inputParameters.title: CreateSessionRequest
inputParameters.description: Parameters to create a new Hyperbrowser session.

liveUrl.description: Live view URL for real-time monitoring
liveUrl.title: Live Url

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Delete Profile
tools.description: Tool to delete a profile. Use when you need to remove a profile by its unique identifier after confirming its existence.

id.description: Unique identifier of the profile to delete.
id.title: Id

inputParameters.title: DeleteProfileRequest
inputParameters.description: Request parameters for deleting a profile by ID.

success.description: True if the profile was successfully deleted.
success.title: Success

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Get browser-use task status
tools.description: Tool to retrieve the current status of a browser-use task. Use when checking if a browser automation task has completed or is still pending.

task_id.description: Unique identifier of the browser-use task to query.
task_id.title: Task Id

inputParameters.title: GetBrowserUseTaskStatusRequest
inputParameters.description: Request model for retrieving the status of a browser-use task.

status.description: Current status of the browser-use task (e.g., 'pending', 'completed').
status.title: Status

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Get Claude Computer Use Task Status
tools.description: Tool to retrieve the status of a Claude Computer Use task. Use after creating a task to poll its status.

id.title: Id

inputParameters.title: GetClaudeComputerUseTaskStatusRequest
inputParameters.description: Request model for retrieving the status of a Claude Computer Use task.

status.description: Current status of the Claude Computer Use task
status.title: Status

error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Get Crawl Job Result
tools.description: Tool to retrieve the result of a completed crawl job. Use after confirming crawl job completion to fetch current page batch and status. Supports pagination via page and batchSize.

batchSize.description: Number of items per page batch.
batchSize.title: Batch Size

page.description: Zero-based page index for result pagination.
page.title: Page

inputParameters.title: GetCrawlJobResultRequest
inputParameters.description: Request schema for retrieving the result of a crawl job.

currentPageBatch.description: Index of the batch contained in this response
currentPageBatch.title: Current Page Batch

items.description: Individual page data returned in a crawl job result batch.
items.title: CrawlDataItem

error.description: Error message if this page failed
error.title: Error

links.description: List of discovered links on the page.
links.title: Links

metadata.description: Additional arbitrary metadata returned for this page
metadata.title: Metadata

status.description: Result status for this page: completed|failed
status.title: Status

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

totalCrawledPages.description: Number of pages crawled so far
totalCrawledPages.title: Total Crawled Pages

totalPageBatches.description: Total number of result batches available
totalPageBatches.title: Total Page Batches

tools.name: Get Crawl Job Status
tools.description: Tool to retrieve the status and results of a specific crawl job. Use after submitting a crawl job to check its progress or fetch results.

currentPageBatch.description: Index of the batch currently in progress
currentPageBatch.title: Current Page Batch

data.description: Detailed results per page in this crawl
data.title: Data

error.description: Error message if this page failed
error.title: Error

links.description: List of extracted links, if requested
links.title: Links

metadata.description: Any additional metadata returned for this page
metadata.title: Metadata

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

totalCrawledPages.description: Number of pages crawled so far
totalCrawledPages.title: Total Crawled Pages
